question: Hasrat Isa (Alayhis salaam) will come back down,but will he (pbuh) come down at the time he went up and not in say year 2000?
answer:
QUESTION
Hasrat Isa (Alayhis salaam) will come back down,but will he (pbuh) come down at the time he went up and not in say year 2000 (say for example if the last day was in year 2000)or will he come down in this present time.
ANSWER


Share:
Hadhrat Eesa (Alayhis salaam) will return to earth before Qiyaamat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
